answers.answer: Me to...my nose bleeds every other day and especially in my sleep..and headaches are normal it's just blood flow from your pregnancy causing the headaches..nose bleeds are normal to..my doctor said those are things you have no choice but to go through during pregnancy
Its totally normal I've had that throughout my first pregnancy i just used Tylenol for the headache but for the nose bleeds their isnt much u can do for it.
Well definitely tell your doctor about the headaches. Thats a sign of preeclampsia. Just rule that out.
Im the same getting head aches and my nose bleeds when I blow my nose. Im only 14 weeks x

question: I'm 28 weeks and experiencing headaches and nosebleeds, only when I blow my nose! Is it normal to experience this or I it something I have to worry about? I'm a ftm! Anyone else experiencing this?
title: 28 weeks and headaches???
